company.name: BAAN CHADAR THAI CUISINE PTE. LTD.

jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced Thai Chef. Minimum 3 years experience working in a Thai kitchen. Well versed in Thai cuisine. Knowledge about food cost and menu planning . The right candidate must be a team player who is willing to work hard and assist to achieve the restaurant's set target. Salary will be between $2800-$4500 based on experience.

Roles ; Responsibilities Prepare lunch ; bar snacks according to standard recipes and assist the Chef de Partie / Jr Sous Chef as necessary.  Requirements    Takes care of daily food preparation and duties assigned to meet the standard and the quality set by the company.   Ensure compliance with all legally required hygiene and safety practices at all times, and maintain high standards of cleanliness and safety in the kitchen and other relevant areas.   Follow the instructions and recommendations from the immediate superiors to complete the daily tasks.   Coordinates daily tasks with the Sous Chef / Junior Sous Chef / Chef de Partie.   Assist to supervise line cook or commis, as required.   Able to estimate the daily production needs and checking the quality of raw and cooked food products to ensure that standards are met.   Ensure that the production, preparation and presentation of food are of the highest quality at all times.   Ensure highest levels of guest satisfaction, quality, operating and food costs on an ongoing basis.   Knowledge of all standard procedures and policies pertaining to food preparation, receiving, storage and sanitation.   Full awareness of all menu items, their recipes, methods of production and presentation standards.   Follow good preservation standards for proper handling of all food products at right temperature.   Check expiry dates and proper storage of food items in the section.   Ensure effective communication between staff by maintaining a secure and friendly and non-political working environment.

Responsibilities    Set up workstations with all needed ingredients and cooking equipment   Prepare ingredients to use in cooking (chopping and peeling      vegetables, cutting meat etc.)   Cook food in various utensils or grillers   Check food while cooking to stir or turn   Ensure great presentation by dressing dishes before they are served   Keep a sanitized and orderly environment in the kitchen   Ensure all food and other items are stored properly   Check quality of ingredients   Monitor stock and place orders when there are shortages  Requirements and skills    Proven experience as chef   Experience in using cutting tools, cookware and bakeware   Knowledge of various cooking procedures and methods (grilling,      baking, boiling etc.)   Ability to follow all sanitation procedures   Ability to work in a team   Very good communication skills   Excellent physical condition and stamina

Direct all kitchen operations, including food preparation, cooking, and cleanup   Maintain kitchen equipment as needed   Supervise chefs and cooks   Resolve issues as they arise to ensure the continuation of foodservice   Maintain control of the kitchen to ensure efficiency   Plan menus and set prices based on the availability of ingredients   Make sure that all staff adhere to food safety and hygiene regulations to ensure a clean and sanitary kitchen   Inspect raw and cooked food to guaranty quality   Collaborate with the general manager and owner to aline kitchen operations with the overarching goals of the establishment   Direct monthly inventory   Maintain vender relationships   Recruit and train chefs and kitchen staff

company.name: MADRAS NEW WOODLANDS RESTAURANT PTE. LTD.

jobs.description: Roles ; Responsibilities Chef skilled in the preparation of North and South Indian cuisine, including Indian sweets, is urgently required. At least 5 to 7 years' prior experience in an Indian kitchen is required. Must be able to work independently as well as co-ordinate food preparation with other kitchen staff. Applicants must be knowledgeable in both traditional and fusion food and possess good hygiene practices. Successful applicant is required to work 2 shifts daily. Only male applicants need apply. Interested applicants may contact admin at 98427141 for an interview.

Roles ; Responsibilities Chef skilled in the preparation of North and South Indian cuisine, including Indian sweets, is urgently required. At least 5 to 7 years' prior experience in an Indian kitchen is required. Must be able to work independently as well as co-ordinate food preparation with other kitchen staff. Applicants must be knowledgeable in both traditional and fusion food and possess good hygiene practices. Successful applicant is required to work 2 shifts daily. Only male applicants need apply. Interested applicants may contact admin at 98427141 for an interview.

CHEF / Cook is responsible for the creation of high quality dishes in his role as part of the kitchen team and duties include: · To assist the Head Chef in the organisation and controlling of all kitchen operations.    To organise and lead the cooks in the food preparation.   To go for outdoor caterings , as and when required, to take orders and work as captain and hall in charge as per the restaurant requirements.   Help in dish washing , kitchen cleaning and other chores given to you as and when required.   To COOK ALL KINDS OF SOUTH INDIAN FOOD , TIFFIN ITEMS , CURRY ETC.   ensure complete customer satisfaction, through provision and quality, control of food, hygiene and service adopting a customer-focussed approach at all times.   To communicate effectively with front staff, cooks and Chef in the execution of task.   To ensure the kitchen is always clean, tidy and hygienic.   To assist in the job training of junior chefs and trainees.   To ensure that lights, electric, gas and water is not used unnecessarily.   To be able to control waste with good stock rotation, ordering and temperature control.   To comply and maintain all Health and Safety standards within the kitchen and the Hall.   AT LEAST TWO YEARS EXPERIENCE AS Chef any INDIAN RESTAURANT. MUST BE ABLE TO COOK SPECIFIC TO THE CUSTOMERS REQUIREMENTS, LIKE SPECIAL MENU ITEMS LIKE Rabdi Malpua, Dal Dhokli, Khoba Roti , Ram Khichdi , Dudhi Muthiya , Ram Khichdi and many more. CHAT ITEMS , AND INDIAN DESSERTS LIKE JALEBI , MALPUA , RASMALAI ,SRIKHAND HIGH PRESCENCE OF MIND IN ATTENDING TO CUSTOMERS COMPLAINTS.

1. To oversee and manage the Central and Outlet Kitchen(s) 2. To create and develop unique offerings of cuisine that provides our customers with a variety of selections 3. To demonstrate creativity and innovation skills in the offerings of cuisine 4. To work closely with other chefs in order to achieve highest possible standard of food items 5. To plan, supervise and organize the preparation and execution of all cuisine 6. Management of a team of chefs 7. Oversee staff scheduling of all kitchen staff 8. To reinforce proper cleaning and housekeeping in the kitchen, and to ensure food handling, hygiene standards and regulations are complied with

Master Chef having the experience in Middle Eastern/Turkish cuisine is needed. We are specialized in authentic Middle Eastern/ Turkish Cuisine and therfore need genuine Masterchef to prepare our dishes besides introducing new variations to our menu to widen our offerings over time. Day to day preparation, training to other chef and monitoring their performance. Maintain and assign standard checklist in preparation of each menu to maintain the taste and quality of food.

Established chicken rice stall at toa payoh central  Hiring Assistant chef -Able to lead a term and supervise daily operation  -must be able to accept split shift arrangement  -Off on weekdays only  -Must be able to follow stall style of preparation -Process own transport as needed to report for work at 5.30am

Chef de Cuisine Job Description Template We are looking for an admirable chef de cuisine to lead and inspire our kitchen staff in the creation of culinary masterpieces. The chef de cuisine will be responsible for designing the menu, hiring and training kitchen staff, collaborating with restaurant management, optimizing staff productivity, and stepping in to help wherever needed. To ensure success, you should have excellent leadership skills with experience managing a team of kitchen staff in a high-pressure environment. Top candidates are creative individuals with a passion for great food and excellent service. Chef de Cuisine Responsibilities:    Ensuring that all food meets the highest quality standards and is served on time.   Planning the menu and designing the plating presentation for each dish.   Coordinating kitchen staff, and assisting them as required.   Hiring and training staff to prepare and cook all the menu items.   Stocktaking ingredients and equipment, and placing orders as needed.   Enforcing best practices for safety and sanitation in the kitchen.   Creating new recipes to regularly update the menu.   Keeping track of new trends in the industry.   Incorporating feedback from restaurant staff and patrons to make improvements or resolve issues.  Chef de Cuisine Requirements:    Qualification from a culinary school.   5+ years of experience in a similar position.   In-depth knowledge of food principles and best practices.   Passion for creating incredible food that delights and attracts customers.   Excellent communication skills and leadership qualities.   Ability to thrive in a high-pressure environment.   Creative, innovative thinking.   Exceptional standards for cleanliness, health, and safety.   Experience managing inventories and stocktaking.   Available to work on-call, shifts, after hours, over weekends, and on holidays.

We are looking for a highly-experienced and creative Chef to be part of our team. We are a young and dynamic group, always seeking to bring our guest satisfaction to the highest level! We are looking for a chef who has knowledge and is interested to work on Chinese, fusion Western, and even Italian food. You will have the freedom to experiment and excite our taste buds. You will plan and create new menus, set culinary directions in collaboration with the management, maintain food quality, manage inventory and food costs within budget.  Roles ; Responsibilities  1. Menu Planning and Development: Develop menus that align with the company's brand and meet the customers' expectations, dietary restrictions, and culinary trends. 2. Food Preparation and Cooking: Prepare and cook food to the highest standards and ensure that it is delivered in a timely and professional manner. 3. Kitchen Management: Manage the kitchen's operations, including ordering supplies, managing inventory, and maintaining kitchen equipment to ensure everything is working efficiently. 4. Food Safety and Hygiene: Ensure that the kitchen follows food safety and hygiene regulations, including proper food storage, handling, and preparation, to prevent contamination and illness. 5. Cost Management: Manage the kitchen's budget by controlling food and labor costs, minimizing waste, and maximizing efficiency. 6. Customer Service: Interact with consumer, take feedback, and use it to improve the menu and service quality. 7. Special Events Planning: Plan and execute special events like company dinner and other occasions that require special menus and service. 8. Administrative Duties: Complete administrative duties like equipment, expenses and budgeting reports. Knowledge and experience in various cuisines and modern trends will be an advantage  Key Requirements:  · Three (3) to five (5) years of experience · Dynamic, Proactive and Independent with a positive attitude · Familiar with Food ; Beverage trends, meticulous with a flair for menu creation · Service oriented, meticulous, attention to detail · All nationality are welcome to apply however reading, writing and oral proficiency in Mandarin is essential. We regret that only shortlisted applicants will be notified.

Our company is currently looking for cooks to support our team of passionate and talented individuals for our kitchens. Our restaurants and catering are very food focused, offering high tea, event nights, mocktails and amazing cuisine produced by our kitchen team.  The candidate will report to and work closely with the Chef and Sous Chef.  1) 5 Day work week 2) 5.5 Work Week 3) From 4 hours Part Time  Our company treasures talents by offering good career enhancement.  Responsibilities Prepare menus in collaboration with colleagues Ensure adequacy of mise en place before service Follow guidance and instructions of the head or sous chef and share input of preparation and presentation of dishes Ensuring cleanliness of the kitchen and work stations Put effort in optimizing the cooking process with attention to speed and quality Adhere to strict health and hygiene standards Help to maintain a smooth and friendly work environment Staff will also be required to perform ad-hoc duties as per management’s requirements.  Requirements Possess good interpersonal skills Interest and passion in hospitality, food and beverage Excellent use of various cooking methods, ingredients, equipment and processes Experienced in catering will be appreciated Ability to multitask and work efficiently under pressure Good work ethics, positive attitude and pleasant personality High quality standards in customer service, health, hygiene, food and beverage (Experience in similar industry and any relevant education would be an advantage  Benefits: · Additional leave · Dental Allowance · Employee discount · Gum Membership · Food provided · Free parking · Parental leave · Professional development  Supplemental pay types: · $50 Weekly incentive · $35 Monthly incentive · Tips · Yearly bonus  Experience: · Cook: 3 year (Preferred)
